snippet: The commission’s report found a need for urgent reform, describing a political system in which money is dominant and misconduct is routine,
abstract: Commission to Investigate Public Corruption, appointed by Gov Andrew M Cuomo, issues stinging assessment of New York State's political culture, describing a political system in which money is dominant and misconduct routine; recommends sweeping changes to state’s elections, ethics and campaign finance laws.
lead_paragraph: The commission’s report found a need for urgent reform, describing a political system in which money is dominant and misconduct is routine,

headline.main: Panel Appointed by Cuomo Says Corruption Is Commonplace in Albany
headline.print_headline: Panel Appointed by Cuomo Says Corruption Is Commonplace in Albany

keywords.value: Moreland Commission to Investigate Public Corruption (NYS)
